node.title: Virgil
node.doctext:
This is a shared user account under the control of the [e2docs] usergroup. This account is responsible for the [Everything2 Help] files.

[Everything2 Help]

This is the official guide to enjoying and contributing to Everything2.

  • [An Introduction to Everything2] — What is Everything2?

Writing for Publication on Everything2

Basics

  • [Everything2 FAQ] — A few simple questions answered.
  • [E2 Quick Start] — the lowdown on how to contribute your writing.
  • [How do I submit a writeup of my own?] — step-by-step technical instructions with necessary concepts explained.
  • [Links on Everything2] — the culture and practicalities of linking here.
  • [Everything2 Glossary] — 'noding'? 'Daylogs'? You may occasionally need to look up site jargon.

How to avoid negative feedback (downvotes, deleted writeups and so on):

  • [Writeup Deletion]
  • [What writings are accepted on Everything2?] — advice you should have read before your first writeup was deleted.
  • [What should I node?] — What kinds of topics are successful?
  • [What NOT to do on Everything2] — things the regular users are tired of seeing.
  • [When is it ok to node about noding?] — generally speaking, keep it to the day logs.

More

  • [Everything2 Staff]
  • [Pick Titles Carefully]
  • [Using Special HTML Characters]
  • [Everything2 Copyright and Fair Use FAQ]
  • [Adding Public Domain Materials to Everything2]
  • [Uses for Empty Nodes or Nodeshells]
  • [Assimilating old writeups]
  • [Using languages other than English on Everything2]
  • [Back up your work on Everything2]

The User Interface

  • [Home Node] — Your profile and account name.
  • [Nodelet|Nodelets]
  • [Chatterbox]
  • [Polls]
  • [Zen Theme]

Levels and Experience

  • [The Everything2 Voting/Experience System]
  • [Eggs, Tokens, E2 Gift Shop and Wheel of Surprise]
  • [Why don't I have votes today?]

Getting more help

  • [usergroup[by Virgil]|Everything2 Usergroups]

Special Node Topics

  • [Day Logs]
  • [Everything2 Quests and Contests]
  • [Everything2 Gathering and Aftermath nodes]
  • [The Webster1913 Dictionary on Everything2] (Public Domain Dictionary)

Further Reading (not by Virgil)

  • [The Newbie's Guide to Your Home Node] by [Rancid_Pickle]
  • [Everything2 Chatterbox Commands] by [mauler]
  • [E2 FAQ: Bookmarks / Personal Nodelet] by [/dev/joe]
  • [E2 HTML tags : Quick Start] by [N-Wing]
  • [E2 HTML] — Guide to using HTML on E2 by [themanwho]
  • [HTML symbol reference] by [mcc] and [Accipiter]
  • [Everything Style Guide] by [Wharfinger]
  • [E2 Bugs] by [JayBonci]
  • [Online Community Dynamics] by Clay Shirky
  • The results of the latest E2 Research Survey conducted by [clampe]'s students, available [https://www.msu.edu/~lampecli/papers/pap1604_lampe.pdf|here].
